mapper.select: select * from (select rownum R, M.* from (select * from member) M) where R between 1 and 10
select * from member where id=#{id} and pw=#{pw}
mapper.delete: { call DEL_MEMBER(#{id, mode=IN}, #{result, mode=OUT, javaType=int, jdbcType=INTEGER},#{message, mode=OUT, javaType=String, jdbcType=CHAR}) }
